definitions.title: demonstr.pron.pl.
definitions.body: these (pl. of [[דֵּח]], q.v.: Eg. Aram [[אלך]] (Cooke:207 RES:361 B S-C:Pap. E 6+): with hâ prefixed, OSyr. hlwk, f hlyk Nö:§ 67, M § 82 Burkitt Evang. da-Mepharreshe ii.42, Chr-Pal. hlyk (m. and f.) Schw Idiot.24; cf. Ar. 0’uwla0ka, Eth.0lku:: Di Lex.1057: the demonst. affix [[ך]] as in [[דֵּח]], d-a0ka, etc.; W:CG 110);—these, [[גֻּבְרַיׇּא]] [[אִלֵּךְ]] these men, Da 3:12, Da 3:13, Da 3:21, Da 3:22, Da 3:23, Da 3:27, Da 6:6, Da 6:12, Da 6:16, Da 6:25, Ezr 4:21, Ezr 6:8 b; also Ezr 5:9, Ezr 6:8 a.
